<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced School Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=647) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 211 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[arcane school](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school. If you’re an abjurer, you gain [_energy absorption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=528); if you’re a conjurer, you gain [_dimensional steps_](/Spells.aspx?ID=524); if you’re a diviner, you gain [_vigilant eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=536); if you’re an enchanter, you gain [_dread aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=526); if you’re an evoker, you gain [_elemental tempest_](/Spells.aspx?ID=527); if you’re an illusionist, you gain [_invisibility cloak_](/Spells.aspx?ID=531); if you’re a necromancer, you gain [_life siphon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=532); and if you’re a transmuter, you gain [_shifting form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=535). Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Advanced School Spell
